title: A Reason To Believe
description: Do you believe in Santa? At some point in every child’s life, this question comes up. For some its at two and others at ninety-two. Well I believe in that Jolly old man and I’m proud to say it! I’m one of the lucky few, who got to see him with my own eyes. Yes, I know what all of you are saying, but it’s true! Anyway, here’s my story about it and why I proudly say that I believe! Why I can honestly say that the spirit of Christmas is with me year around!
author: Brett A. Reif
